hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the castle guards' routes have major security vulnerabilities.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (20 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Hover Boots#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Shortcut Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path of #the hero#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #6# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Barinade#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #stalfos in the Shadow Temple# guard #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Stalfos Room Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #the hero#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Slingshot# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple MQ Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #an Ice Trap# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: I am the King of Gossip Stones, but fear not - I have the common touch! That means I can make conversation with everyone^from foreign dignitaries to the lowliest bumpkin - such as yourself!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.
